plain_text:
United States Court of Appeals
For the First Circuit
           No. 98-1747

    JOHN THORNTON,

Plaintiff, Appellant,

          v.

HARVARD UNIVERSITY, ET AL.,

Defendants, Appellees.

     ERRATA SHEET

Entered: February 4, 1999

The unpublished per curiam opinion issued on February 3, 1999, mispells plaintiff-appellant's last name as "Thorton."  Wherever the name appears, it should read "Thornton."
